query: How can I lock in my morning focus routine?
assumptions: You can reserve time before noon without conflicts.

recommendations.title: Book consistent focus blocks
steps: Reserve two 45-minute focus sessions before noon.
Protect the blocks in your calendar and announce them to teammates.
risks: Teammates may schedule over the reserved time.
mitigations: Share the focus plan during the weekly sync.

next_actions: Send a note to the team about your focus blocks today.
